description:
Cassie`s Sawsbuck participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the sixth match and faced off against Geraldo`s Reuniclus. The match quickly showcased Geraldo`s Reuniclus finishing off Cassie`s Sawsbuck to win the battle which allowed Geraldo to advance to the second round while Cassie was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Cassie`s Sawsbuck moves are known.
name: Mebukijika (Kobashi)
